entity.name: final
entity.query: SELECT status.status_id, status.label AS status_label, relation.relation_id, relation.label AS relation_label, product.product_id, product.label AS product_label, occupation.occupation_id, occupation.label AS occupation_label, occupation.english_translation, occupation.country_code, occupation.lang_code, occupation_link_hisco.link_id, occupation_link_hisco.hisco_id, occupation_link_hisco.comnum, occupation_link_hisco.comtxt, occupation_link_hisco.provenance, 'occupations' as 'table' FROM occupation_link_hisco LEFT JOIN status ON occupation_link_hisco.status_id=status.status_id LEFT JOIN product ON occupation_link_hisco.product_id=product.product_id LEFT JOIN occupation ON occupation_link_hisco.occupation_id=occupation.occupation_id LEFT JOIN relation ON occupation_link_hisco.relation_id=relation.relation_id WHERE (occupation_link_hisco.link_id=${item.link_id})

entity.name: images
entity.query: SELECT images.image_url FROM images WHERE (images.hisco_id=${item.hisco_id} AND NOT images.hisco_id=-1)
